Cycle SDLC which includes developing design analysis testing and Integration of various web based and clientserver applications in multiplatform environments with JAVAJ2EE technologies Experience in developing applications using Agile Methodology Waterfall Methodology Proficient in developing the application by implementing the OOPS and Core Java Concepts like Collections Exception Handling and Multithreading Experience in applying best practice Design Patterns and Strategies to enterprise applications to reduce tight coupling maximize performance and reduce maintenanceextensibility risks Created and Configure Micro Service architecture and integrated with AngularJS application Implemented RESTful services with JAXRS using Spring Boot and Micro Services Architecture Expertise in design with Use Case Sequence diagrams Activity diagrams Class diagrams Expertise in FrontEnd UI technologies like HTML CSS JSON AngularJS Proficient in developing the enterprise application with Servlets Struts Spring Framework modules like Spring IOC Spring MVC Model View Controller and ORM Frameworks like Hibernate Excellent experience in developing RESTful Services and SOAP based Web Services Involved in designing the clientside module architecture based on new Angular Framework Expertise in XML technologies such as XSL XSLT XML schemas and parsers like SAX and DOM Experience in developing messaging module by using Spring JMS Good experience in working with various Relational databases like MS SQL Server Oracle Used Spring Boot for developing Micro services REST to retrieve data from clientside using Micro service architecture Expertise at JDBC API for connection and access to databases Experience using Hibernate for mapping Java classes with database and using Criteria API and Hibernate Query Language HQL Good experience with Data Access Object DAO pattern to introduce an abstraction layer between the Business logic tier Business object and the Persistent storage tier data source Excellent in writing SQL Queries PLSQL Stored Procedures Expertise in writing test cases with JUnit to test the application functionalities Hands on experience with various Servers like Web Sphere Jboss and Apache Tomcat Experience in development deployment and troubleshooting applications on Windows UNIX and Linux platforms Hands on experience with build tools like ANT Maven Extensive experience in using different IDEs like RAD Eclipse and IntelliJ Experience in using various version control tools like SVN and Git Experience as a Production Support and technical support for complex critical applications and coordinated with other teams to resolve enduser issues promptly Excellent written and verbal communication skills Analytical Problem Solving skills strict attention to detail and ability to work independently and cross functional team environments Good understanding of Business workflow Business logic and Business methods for further implementation of user requirement in a distributed application environment Work Experience JAVAJ2EE DEVELOPER Tata Consultancy Services Montvale NJ July 2015 to Present Description The Western Union Company is a financial services and communications company based in the United States Its North American headquarters is in Englewood Colorado Western Union has several divisions with products such as persontoperson money transfer money orders business payments and commercial services Western Unions website westernunioncom allows users to send and receive funds to others pay bills or purchase gift cards Responsibilities Analyze the business requirement produced by the business teams and to provide suggestions and feedback on the business requirement that would fit the current system architecture Participate in all the business and software requirement walkthroughs and provide technical ideas and inputs to implement the solution Design the solution of the project based on the business and software requirements gathered Prepare a technical design document encompassing the prototypes of various components involved overall system architecture interface layouts batch requirements Develop the project solution based on the design that was agreed by all project stakeholders Resolve the defects and queries that arise during Quality Assurance and User acceptance testing by providing appropriate fixes Perform the promotion process of the developed and tested code into the production environment Environment JavaJ2EE Java Script Spring Framework Angular JS Hibernate XML Web Services Oracle PLSQL HTML XSLT Jetty requests and development tools Development and testing of the applications Coordinate and Partner with other stakeholders technology teams during implementation Drive the use of Best Practices allows the American Express internal users to maintain the data of the corporate clients process their applications assess credit risk involved with the help of a third party credit authorization system create the account hierarchy that best suits the clients organizational structure and feed this data to a central repository from where other systems use this data to issue corporate cards
